description: Try our easy to follow Mushroom Ragu With Creamy Polenta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mushroom Ragu With Creamy Polenta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20 g Western Star Spreadable Original Soft

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, spoon the creamy polenta onto serving plates and top with the mushroom ragu. Scatter with a little extra parmesan and the parsley.
